text: Hello, how are you doing today, may I ask if you are a charitable person?
I'm well thanks, how are you? Depending on the situation, I try to be.
I am doing fine, I just ask in case you would like to donate to a nonprofit organization called Save The Children
What exactly does the organization do?
It helps the children all around the world, whether they are poor o not
Yes, but how does the organization help the children? Specifically?
Builds schools, gets them scholarships, builds orphanages, educates them, provides them with food and shelter, all kinds of things
How does the organization determine which children they will help?
They try to help every kid they can, so, they operate all around the world
Yes, but how do they identify chlidren to help?
They mostly look around UNICEF reports and other Human Rights Organizations
Is there already an infrastructure if they want to approach a new village?

They usually approach first by trying to get on the good side of the villagers, helping them with what they need, they only build infrastructure after they have gotten their permission, that way they don't intromise with their customs or rules
What do you mean by intromise?
Sometimes the villagers think that the organization volunteers are trying to change their customs or force them to accept something
Sorry, I didn't recognize that word.
So, would you like to donate to this organization?
Sorry, I just don't think that I know enough about what exactly they do.
Well, they pretty much help children, that's what they do, they try to give them a brighter future and give them the tools to progress instead of doing everything for them
But, for example, you can build a school, but if you don't enable the village to build, support, and potentiate a staff, it doesn't really do them any good.
